title: Alpha-Lipoic Acid
fields: ALA is probably the [single most effective neuroprotective supplement you can buy for MDMA.](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/10619665) Use with acetyl-l-carnitine for best results (use command ``.alcar`` for more information).

300mg with MDMA, then every 1-2 hours after that until 7 hours post dose (total of 1,200-2,400mg)
**Do not consume more than 2,400mg in a day**
The information provided is only a means to raise awareness and should not be construed as medical advice. Always consult with your doctor before taking supplements.
